content: Stephen C Hirtle Stephen C. Hirtle Pitt | SCI | DINS | BSIS | SIRG About Dr. Stephen C. Hirtle is Professor in School of Computing and Information at the University of Pittsburgh, with joint appointments in the Department of Psychology and Intelligent Systems Program. He directs the Spatial Information Research Group at the University of Pittsburgh, which conducts research on the structure of cognitive maps, navigation in real and virtual environments, and both applied and theoretical models for spatial cognition.
